biocontainers.name: topas
biocontainers.summary: This toolkit allows the efficient manipulation of sequence data in various ways. it is organized into modules: the fasta processing modules, the fastq processing modules, the gff processing modules and the vcf processing modules.

biotools.summary: Proton Monte Carlo platform for research and clinical applications.

bioschemas.summary: Proton Monte Carlo platform for research and clinical applications.
